data.comment: Today's referee, Gavin Ward, has blown to start the match.
Joe Rothwell (Blackburn) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Luton.
Luton make their first substitution with James Collins replacing Elliott Lee.
In the minute 59, Nathan Jones is making the team's second substitution at Kenilworth Road with James Bree replacing Harry Cornick.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a first substitution, with Sam Gallagher replacing Tom Trybull.
Goal! Luke Berry gives Luton a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 71, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Sam Gallagher.
The home team replace Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall with Kazenga LuaLua.
Ruddock Pelly is on a sub for Luke Berry for Luton.
In the minute 81, Bradley Johnson (Blackburn) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
The home team have replaced Martin Cranie with Ryan Tunnicliffe. This is the fifth substitution made today by Nathan Jones.
